data.name: Driveby Gangster
data.detailed_description:
Driveby Gangster is a 1930's era game where you assume the role of a vigilante out-of-work private eye. Your goal is to eliminate the enemy gangsters that have invaded your quaint west-coast city while avoiding innocent bystanders.

Grabbing your trusted thompson (tommy) submachine gun, you take to the streets to dispense justice one driveby at a time. Various obstacles get in your way from innocent bystanders that you must avoid, increasingly hostile gangsters that shoot back, to changing turbulent weather conditions. As you play and progress in the game, Murphy's own grasp on reality begins to loosen, and the game's presentation style takes a dark turn.

Like in life, the decisions you make in this game have consequences.

Various obstacles get in your way from innocent bystanders that you must avoid, increasingly hostile gangsters that shoot back, to changing turbulent weather conditions. As you play and progress in the game, Murphy's own grasp on reality begins to loosen, and the game's presentation style takes a dark turn.

data.short_description: Driveby Gangster is a 1930's era game where you assume the role of a vigilante out-of-work private eye. Your goal is to eliminate the enemy gangsters that have invaded your quaint west-coast city while avoiding innocent bystanders.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: XAudio2-Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or better
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit Intel CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: XAudio2-Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 Compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-Compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit Intel CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 Compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-Compatible
